briefdescription.para: move into menu for given diff pos ; return false if at end of menu

memberdef.argsstring: (int addr, int cols, int rows, int rotAPin, int rotBPin, int rotSWPin, bool inverted=false, int btnDebounceMs=50, int abDebounceUs=1500)
memberdef.name: LCDRotaryMenu

parameterdescription.para: if true cw/ccw generates decrement/increment in position

briefdescription.para: force menu redraw, for use within programmatic menu manipulation not tie within callbacks

parameterdescription.para: callback here you can directly used lcd ( clear, setCursor, print )

briefdescription.para: set default callback when select menuitem that has no custom callback
set callback on select this item (multi select mode)
set callback that will be called everytime button switch ; it's called before any specific onSelect callback
set callback when press on .. ( parent ) ; parent menu can be retrived using callbacak argument getParent()
set callback that will be called everytime rotary move to different menu item
